name: all_country
desc: Checks if all countries meet the triggers.

name: any_country
desc: Checks if any country meets the triggers.

name: all_other_country
desc: Checks if all countries other than the one where this scope is located meet the triggers.

name: any_other_country
desc: Checks if any country other than the one where this scope is located meets the triggers.

name: all_country_with_original_tag
desc: Checks if all countries originating from the specified country, including the dynamic countries created for civil wars and other purposes, meet the triggers.

name: any_country_with_original_tag
desc: Checks if any country originating from the specified country, including the dynamic countries created for civil wars and other purposes, meet the triggers.

name: all_neighbor_country
desc: Checks if all countries that border the one where this scope is located meet the triggers.

name: any_neighbor_country
desc: Checks if any country that borders the one where this scope is located meets the triggers.

name: any_home_area_neighbor_country
desc: Checks if any country that borders the one where this scope is located, as well as being in its home area - meaning a direct land connection between the capitals of countries - meets the triggers.

name: all_guaranteed_country
desc: Checks if all countries that are guaranteed by the one where this scope is located meet the triggers.

name: any_guaranteed_country
desc: Checks if any country that is guaranteed by the one where this scope is located meets the triggers.

name: all_allied_country
desc: Checks if all countries that are allied with the one where this scope is located meet the triggers. Does not include the country itself.

name: any_allied_country
desc: Checks if any country that is allied with the one where this scope is located meet the triggers. Does not include the country itself.

name: all_occupied_country
desc: Checks if all countries that are occupied by the one where this scope is located meet the triggers.

name: any_occupied_country
desc: Checks if any country that is occupied by the one where this scope is located meet the triggers.

name: all_enemy_country
desc: Checks if all countries that are at war with the one where this scope is located meet the triggers.

name: any_enemy_country
desc: Checks if any country that are at war with the one where this scope is located meets the triggers.

name: all_subject_countries
desc: Checks if all countries that are a subject of the one where this scope is located meet the triggers.

name: any_subject_country
desc: Checks if any country that is a subject of the one where this scope is located meets the triggers.

name: any_country_with_core
desc: Checks if any country that has the current scope as a core state meets the triggers.

name: all_state
desc: Check if all states meet the triggers.

name: any_state
desc: Check if any state meets the triggers.

name: any_state_in
desc: Check if any state in the given category meets the trigger.

name: all_neighbor_state
desc: Check if all states that are neighbour to the one where this scope is located meet the triggers.

name: any_neighbor_state
desc: Check if any state that is neighbour to the one where this scope is located meets the triggers.

name: all_owned_state
desc: Check if all states that are owned by the country where this scope is located meet the triggers.

name: any_owned_state
desc: Check if any state that is owned by the country where this scope is located meets the triggers.

name: all_core_state
desc: Check if all states that are cored by the country where this scope is located meet the triggers.

name: any_core_state
desc: Check if any state that is cored by the country where this scope is located meets the triggers.

name: all_controlled_state
desc: Check if all states that are controlled by the country where this scope is located meet the triggers.

name: any_controlled_state
desc: Check if any state that is controlled by the country where this scope is located meets the triggers.

name: all_unit_leader
desc: Checks if all unit leaders (corps commanders, field marshals, admirals) that are employed by the country where this scope is located meet the triggers.

name: any_unit_leader
desc: Checks if any unit leader (corps commander, field marshal, admiral) that is employed by the country where this scope is located meets the triggers.

name: all_army_leader
desc: Checks if all army leaders that are employed by the country where this scope is located meet the triggers.

name: any_army_leader
desc: Checks if any army leader that is employed by the country where this scope is located meets the triggers.

name: all_navy_leader
desc: Checks if all navy leaders that are employed by the country where this scope is located meet the triggers.

name: any_navy_leader
desc: Checks if any navy leader that is employed by the country where this scope is located meets the triggers.

name: all_operative_leader
desc: Checks if all operatives that are employed by the country where this scope is located meet the triggers.

name: any_operative_leader
desc: Checks if any operative that is employed by the country where this scope is located meets the triggers.

name: all_character
desc: Checks if all characters that are recruited by the country where this scope is located meet the triggers.

name: any_character
desc: Checks if any character that is recruited by the country where this scope is located meets the triggers.

name: any_country_division
desc: Checks if any division owned by the current country meets the triggers.

name: any_state_division
desc: Checks if any division within the current state meets the triggers.

name: all_military_industrial_organization
desc: Checks if all MIOs within the current country meet the conditions.

name: any_military_industrial_organization
desc: Checks if any MIO within the current country meets the conditions.

name: all_purchase_contract
desc: Checks if all purchase contracts within the current country meet the conditions.

name: any_purchase_contract
desc: Checks if any purchase contract within the current country meet the conditions.

name: all_scientists
desc: Checks if all scientists of the Country in scope matches the triggers.

name: any_scientist
desc: Checks if at least one active scientist of the Country in scope matches the triggers.

name: all_active_scientist
desc: Checks if all active scientists of the Country in scope matches the triggers.

name: any_active_scientist
desc: Checks if at least one active scientist of the Country in scope matches the triggers.

name: AND
desc: Returns false if any sub-trigger returns false, true otherwise. Evaluation stops at the first false sub-trigger.

name: OR
desc: Returns true if any sub-trigger returns true, false otherwise. Evaluation stops at the first true sub-trigger.

name: NOT
desc: Returns false if any sub-trigger returns true, true otherwise. Evaluation stops at the first true sub-trigger.

name: count_triggers
desc: Sums the results of all sub-triggers (false=0, true=1) and returns true if the sum is at least amount.

name: if
desc: If limit is true, the sub-triggers are evaluated like an AND-trigger. If limit is false, else_if blocks are tried in sequence and finally else (if present). Otherwise true is returned.

name: hidden_trigger
desc: Hides the triggers from the tooltip shown to the player.

name: custom_trigger_tooltip
desc: Hides the triggers from the tooltip shown to the player and instead uses the specified localisation key.

name: custom_override_tooltip
desc: An AND trigger that has an overriden custom tooltip.

name: always
desc: Always returns true or false. Useful for debugging.

name: has_global_flag
desc: Checks if the specified flag has been set. Can also compare the flag's last set date, days since last set, and/or value.

name: has_dlc
desc: Checks if the specified DLC is enabled.

name: has_start_date
desc: Checks if the specified date was the start date used for the current game.

name: date
desc: Checks if the specified date against the current date.

name: difficulty
desc: checks if the specified difficulty against the current difficulty.

name: has_any_custom_difficulty_setting
desc: Checks if any custom difficulty setting is changed from their default value.

name: has_custom_difficulty_setting
desc: Checks if the specified custom difficulty setting is changed from the default value.

name: game_rules_allow_achievements
desc: Checks if all of the active game rule options allow achievements.

name: country_exists
desc: Checks if the specified country currently exists in game.

name: is_ironman
desc: Checks if the current game is running in Ironman mode.

name: is_historical_focus_on
desc: Checks if the current game is running with Historical Focuses on.

name: is_tutorial
desc: Checks if the current game is running in Tutorial mode.

name: is_debug
desc: Checks if game is in debug mode (launched with -debug argument).

name: threat
desc: Checks if World Tension is above the specified amount.

name: has_game_rule
desc: Checks if a game rule is set to a particular option.

name: has_completed_custom_achievement
desc: Checks if the player controlling the current scope has completed the specified custom achievement.

name: has_variable
desc: Checks if the specified variable exists for the current scope.

name: check_variable
desc: Check the specified variable for the current scope.

name: log
desc: Appends an entry into the game.log and, if open, the console when evaluating the trigger.

name: print_variables
desc: Dumps the specified variables from the current scope and optionally the global scope into a log file with the specified name.

name: exists
desc: Checks if the current scope exists in game.

name: tag
desc: Checks if the current scope is the specified country.

name: original_tag
desc: Checks if the current scope originates from the specified country.

name: is_ai
desc: Checks if the current scope is AI.

name: has_collaboration
desc: Checks if the current scope has a collaboration level in the target scope.

name: has_country_flag
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified flag. Can also compare the flag's last set date, days since last set, and/or value.

name: has_cosmetic_tag
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified cosmetic tag active.

name: has_event_target
desc: Checks if current scope or global scope has the specified event target saved.

name: has_decision
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified decision activated.

name: has_dynamic_modifier
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified dynamic modifier activated.

name: has_active_mission
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified mission active.

name: has_country_custom_difficulty_setting
desc: Checks if the any custom difficulty setting targeting the current scope is changed from the default value.

name: has_terrain
desc: Checks if the current scope has any provinces of the specified terrain.

name: is_dynamic_country
desc: Checks if the current scope is a dynamic country.

name: num_of_supply_nodes
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of supply nodes under control.

name: has_resources_in_country
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of the specified resource in reserve.

name: has_focus_tree
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified focus tree.

name: has_completed_focus
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified focus completed.

name: focus_progress
desc: Checks if the specified focus has been completed the specified percent for the current scope.

name: has_shine_effect_on_focus
desc: Check if country has shine effect on focus (either manually achieved or by being worked on).

name: ideology
desc: Checks if the current scope has popularity of the specified ideology above the specified amount. Name is the ideology, e.g. 'fascism'.

name: has_political_power
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of political power.

name: political_power_daily
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of daily political power gain.

name: political_power_growth
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of daily political power gain.

name: command_power
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of command power.

name: command_power_daily
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of daily command power gain.

name: has_war_support
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified percentage of War Support.

name: has_stability
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified percentage of Stability.

name: has_government
desc: Checks if the ruling party of the current scope meets the requirements of being either the specified ideology group or having the same ideology group as the specified country.

name: has_elections
desc: Checks if the current scope holds elections.

name: is_staging_coup
desc: Checks if the current scope is staging a coup.

name: is_target_of_coup
desc: Checks if the current scope is the target of a coup.

name: has_civil_war
desc: Checks if the current scope has a civil war active.

name: civilwar_target
desc: Checks if the specified country is a target of a civil war.

name: has_manpower_for_recruit_change_to
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of manpower for changing the specified idea group.

name: has_rule
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified country rule.

name: has_casualties_war_support
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified percentage of war support from own combat casualties.

name: has_convoys_war_support
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified percentage of war support from own convoys sunk.

name: has_bombing_war_support
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified percentage of war support from own states bombed by the enemy.

name: has_power_balance
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified balance of power active.

name: has_any_power_balance
desc: Checks if the current scope has any balance of power active.

name: power_balance_value
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified value within the balance of power.

name: power_balance_daily_change
desc: Checks if the current scope's balance of power changes each day by the specified value.

name: power_balance_weekly_change
desc: Checks if the current scope's balance of power changes each week by the specified value.

name: is_power_balance_in_range
desc: Checks if the current scope's balance of power value lies within the specified range.

name: is_power_balance_side_active
desc: Checks if the specified balance of power has a side active.

name: has_power_balance_modifier
desc: Checks if the current scope's balance of power value activates a modifier.

name: building_count_trigger
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of the specified building. Name is the building, e.g. 'arms_factory'.

name: num_of_military_factories
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of military factories.

name: num_of_civilian_factories
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of civilian factories.

name: num_of_naval_factories
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of dockyards.

name: num_of_available_military_factories
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of available military factories.

name: num_of_available_civilian_factories
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of available civilian factories.

name: num_of_available_naval_factories
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of available dockyards.

name: num_of_factories
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of military, civilian or dockyard factories.

name: num_of_controlled_factories
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of military, civilian or dockyard factories under control.

name: num_of_owned_factories
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of military, civilian or dockyard factories under owned states.

name: num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of civilian factories usable for projects.

name: ic_ratio
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified ratio of factories with the target country.

name: has_damaged_buildings
desc: Checks if the current scope has any damanged buildings in their states.

name: has_built
desc: Checks if the current scope has built the specified building the specified number of times.

name: has_tech
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified technology.

name: is_researching_technology
desc: Checks if the current scope is currently researching the specified technology.

name: can_research
desc: Checks if the current scope can start researching the specified technology.

name: original_research_slots
desc: Checks if the current scope had the specified amount of slots at game start.

name: amount_research_slots
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of research slots.

name: is_in_tech_sharing_group
desc: Checks if the current scope is in the specified technology sharing group.

name: num_tech_sharing_groups
desc: Checks if the current scope is in the specified amount of technology sharing groups.

name: has_tech_bonus
desc: Checks if the current scope has a technology bonus in the specified category, or for the specific technology.

name: land_doctrine_level
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of land doctrine technologies.

name: num_researched_technologies
desc: Checks how many technologies the target has researched.

name: is_special_project_completed
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified special project completed.

name: has_idea
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified idea.

name: has_idea_with_trait
desc: Checks if the current scope has any ideas with the specified trait.

name: has_allowed_idea_with_traits
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of ideas with the specified trait.

name: has_available_idea_with_traits
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of ideas with the specified trait.

name: amount_taken_ideas
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of ideas of the specified slot type.

name: is_major
desc: Checks if the current scope is considered a Major.

name: is_ally_with
desc: Checks if the current scope is an ally (Faction members or subject-master relation).

name: is_in_faction_with
desc: Checks if the current scope is in a faction with the specified country.

name: is_in_faction
desc: Checks if the current scope is in a faction.

name: is_faction_leader
desc: Checks if the current scope is the leader of a faction.

name: is_spymaster
desc: Checks if the current scope is the spymaster of a faction.

name: num_faction_members
desc: Checks if the faction of the current scope has the specified amount of members.

name: has_non_aggression_pact_with
desc: Checks if the current scope has a non-aggression pact with the specified country.

name: is_guaranteed_by
desc: Checks if the current scope has been guaranteed by the specified country.

name: has_guaranteed
desc: Checks if the current scope has guaranteed the specified country.

name: has_military_access_to
desc: Checks if the current scope has military access to the specified country.

name: gives_military_access_to
desc: Checks if the current scope gives military to the specified country.

name: is_neighbor_of
desc: Checks if the current scope is a neighbor of the specified country.

name: is_owner_neighbor_of
desc: Checks if the current scope is a neighbor of the specified country with their core territory only.

name: is_puppet_of
desc: Checks if the current scope is a puppet of the specified country.

name: is_subject_of
desc: Checks if the current scope is a subject of the specified scope.

name: is_puppet
desc: Returns true if the current country is a puppet.

name: is_subject
desc: Checks if the current scope is a subject.

name: has_subject
desc: Checks if the country has for subject the given country.

name: num_subjects
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of subjects.

name: has_autonomy_state
desc: Checks if the current scope is in the specified autonomous state.

name: compare_autonomy_state
desc: Checks if the current scope's autonomy state min_freedom_level is less or greater than that of the specified autonomy state.

name: compare_autonomy_progress_ratio
desc: Checks if the current scope autonomy progress is at the specified ratio.

name: has_opinion_modifier
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified opinion modifier.

name: has_opinion
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified opinion with the specified country.

name: has_relation_modifier
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified relation modifier with the specified country.

name: has_legitimacy
desc: Checks how much legitimacy the current government in exile has.

name: is_exile_host
desc: Checks if the current country is hosting an exile.

name: is_hosting_exile
desc: Checks if the current country is hosting a specific exile.

name: is_government_in_exile
desc: Checks if the current country is exiled in a different country.

name: is_exiled_in
desc: Checks if the current country is exiled in a specific country.

name: received_expeditionary_forces
desc: Checks if the current country received X units in expeditions from the specified country.

name: can_declare_war_on
desc: Checks if the current scope is able to declare war on the specified country.

name: foreign_manpower
desc: Checks how much foreign manpower we have received for garrisoning.

name: is_embargoed_by
desc: Checks if the current scope is embargoed by the specified country.

name: is_embargoing
desc: Checks if the current scope is embargoing the specified country.

name: has_war
desc: Checks if the current scope is at war.

name: has_war_with
desc: Checks if the current scope is at war with the specified country.

name: has_offensive_war_with
desc: Checks if the current scope is in an offensive war against the specified country.

name: has_defensive_war_with
desc: Checks if the current scope is in a defensive war against the specified country.

name: has_offensive_war
desc: Checks if the current scope is in an offensive war.

name: has_defensive_war
desc: Checks if the current scope is in a defensive war.

name: has_war_together_with
desc: Checks if the current scope is in a war alongside the specified country.

name: has_war_with_major
desc: Checks if the current scope is at war with any other country that is considered major.

name: has_war_with_wargoal_against
desc: Checks if the current scope is at war with the specified country with the specified wargoal being active.

name: surrender_progress
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of surrender progress.

name: any_war_score
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of war progress in any war.

name: has_capitulated
desc: Checks if the current scope has capitulated.

name: days_since_capitulated
desc: Checks the amount of days since the target last capitulated.

name: has_border_war_with
desc: Checks if the current scope has a border war with the specified country.

name: has_border_war_between
desc: Checks if there is a border war between the two specified states.

name: has_border_war
desc: Checks if the current scope has a border war active.

name: has_added_tension_amount
desc: Checks if the current scope has caused the specified amount of World Tension.

name: has_wargoal_against
desc: Checks if the current scope has any wargoal against the specified country, or a specific type.

name: is_justifying_wargoal_against
desc: Checks if the current scope is justifying a wargoal against the specified country.

name: has_annex_war_goal
desc: Checks if the current scope has the Annex wargoal against the specified country.

name: any_claim
desc: Checks if the current scope has any claims on another country.

name: is_in_peace_conference
desc: Checks if the current scope is in a peace conference.

name: controls_province
desc: Checks if the current scope has control of the specified province.

name: longest_war_length
desc: Checks how long a country has been at war, in months.

name: war_length_with
desc: Checks how long a country has been at war with specific country, in months.

name: has_truce_with
desc: Checks if the country has truce with the specified country.

name: controls_state
desc: Checks if the current scope has control of the specified state.

name: owns_state
desc: Checks if the current scope owns the specified state.

name: num_of_controlled_states
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of controlled states.

name: num_occupied_states
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of occupied states.

name: has_full_control_of_state
desc: Checks if the current scope has total control (100% occupation) of the specified state.

name: has_resources_rights
desc: Checks if there are any resource rights with the specified parameters.

name: core_compliance
desc: Compares the average compliance of core states of the specified country within controlled states of the current scope.

name: core_resistance
desc: Compares the average resistance of core states of the specified country within controlled states of the current scope.

name: garrison_manpower_need
desc: Checks how much garrison manpower we need for resistance in controlled states.

name: has_core_occupation_modifier
desc: Checks if the current scope has an occupation modifier for resistance/compliance that applies to our occupied states of a specified country.

name: occupation_law
desc: Checks the occupation law that's either the default or applied over a specific country.

name: has_contested_owner
desc: Checks if a state has the specified country as a contested owner.

name: owns_any_state_of
desc: Check if the country owns any of the states in the list.

name: has_army_experience
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of Army experience.

name: has_air_experience
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of Air experience.

name: has_navy_experience
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of Navy experience.

name: has_manpower
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of manpower.

name: has_army_manpower
desc: Checks if the current scope has an army using the specified amount of manpower.

name: manpower_per_military_factory
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified manpower times their number of military factories.

name: conscription_ratio
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified conscription ratio currently.

name: current_conscription_amount
desc: Checks if the current scope has already conscripted that much manpower.

name: target_conscription_amount
desc: Checks if the current scope is targeting to conscript that much manpower.

name: num_divisions
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of divisions.

name: num_of_nukes
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of nukes.

name: casualties
desc: Checks if the current scope has suffered the specified amount of casualties.

name: casualties_k
desc: Checks if the current scope has suffered the specified amount of casualties in thousands.

name: casualties_inflicted_by
desc: Checks if the current scope has suffered the specified amount of casualties in thousands from a specific country.

name: amount_manpower_in_deployment_queue
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of manpower in their deployment queue.

name: has_attache_from
desc: Checks if the current scope has an attache from the specified scope.

name: has_attache
desc: Checks if the current scope has an attache.

name: is_lend_leasing
desc: Checks if the current scope is lend leasing to the specified scope.

name: has_template
desc: Checks if the current scope has a division template of the specified name.

name: has_template_majority_unit
desc: Checks if the current scope has a division template composed mostly of the specified unit.

name: has_template_containing_unit
desc: Checks if the current scope has a division template contained any of the specified unit.

name: strength_ratio
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified strength ratio against the specified country.

name: fighting_army_strength_ratio
desc: Compares the total army fighting strength between the scope country and the one set with 'tag'.

name: naval_strength_ratio
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified naval strength ratio against the specified country.

name: naval_strength_comparison
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified naval strength ratio against the specified country.

name: alliance_strength_ratio
desc: Checks if the current scope and allies has an army strength higher than the specified ratio against estimated enemy strength.

name: alliance_naval_strength_ratio
desc: Checks if the current scope and allies has an naval strength ratio higher than the specified ratio against estimated enemy strength.

name: enemies_strength_ratio
desc: Checks if the estimated enemy army strength ratio is higher than the specified ratio.

name: enemies_naval_strength_ratio
desc: Checks if the estimated enemy naval strength ratio is higher than the specified ratio.

name: has_army_size
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified number of divisions, or of a specified type of division.

name: has_navy_size
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified number of ships, or of a specified type of ship.

name: has_deployed_air_force_size
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified number of aircraft, or of a specified type of aircraft.

name: divisions_in_state
desc: Checks if the specified state contains the specified amount of divisions.

name: army_manpower_in_state
desc: Checks if the specified state contains the specified amount of army manpower within the state.

name: divisions_in_border_state
desc: Checks if the border provinces between the specified state and border state contain the specified amount of divisions.

name: num_divisions_in_states
desc: Checks if the specified states contain enough divisions of the specified types.

name: num_battalions_in_states
desc: Checks if the specified states contain enough battalions (or sub-units) of the specified types.

name: ships_in_state_ports
desc: Checks if the specified state contains the specified amount of ships, or of ships of the specified type.

name: num_planes_stationed_in_regions
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified number of aircraft stationed within strategic regions.

name: has_volunteers_amount_from
desc: Checks if the current scope has recieved volunteers from the specified country of the specified amounts.

name: convoy_threat
desc: Checks how much the convoys are threatened.

name: has_mined
desc: Checks if the current scope has X mines on the coast of the specified country.

name: has_mines
desc: Checks if the current scope has at least X mines within the specified strategic region.

name: mine_threat
desc: Checks how dangerous enemy mines are.

name: has_military_industrial_organization
desc: Checks if the current scope has a MIO with the specified name.

name: stockpile_ratio
desc: Checks if the current scope has stockpiled the specified equipment to the specified ratio against fielded equipment of the same type.

name: has_equipment
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified equipment to the specified amount.

name: has_any_license
desc: Checks if the current scope has any licenses from other countries.

name: is_licensing_any_to
desc: Checks if the current scope is licensing to the specified scope.

name: is_licensing_to
desc: Checks if the current scope is licensing the specified equipment to the specified country.

name: has_license
desc: Checks if the current scope has a license for the specified equipment from the specified country.

name: fuel_ratio
desc: Checks the fuel ratio of the country.

name: has_fuel
desc: Checks the fuel amount of the country.

name: has_design_based_on
desc: Checks if the country has a builtable non-obsolete design based on the specified equipment archetype.

name: estimated_intel_max_piercing
desc: Checks if the specified scope has the specified amount of piercing based on the current scope's intel.

name: estimated_intel_max_armor
desc: Checks if the specified scope has the specified amount of armor based on the current scope's intel.

name: compare_intel_with
desc: Compares intel between 2 countries.

name: intel_level_over
desc: Checks the intel level from the current country over a specified country.

name: has_intelligence_agency
desc: Checks if the current scope has an intelligence agency.

name: network_national_coverage
desc: Checks network national coverage over a specific country.

name: network_strength
desc: Checks network strength over a specific country or in a specific state.

name: has_done_agency_upgrade
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified agency upgrade (to its highest level).

name: agency_upgrade_number
desc: Checks the number of upgrades done in the current scope's intelligence agency.

name: decryption_progress
desc: Checks the decryption progress towards a country.

name: has_captured_operative
desc: Checks if the current scope has captured an operative.

name: has_finished_collecting_for_operation
desc: Checks if the current scope has finished collecting resources for an operation.

name: is_preparing_operation
desc: Checks if the current scope is preparing an operation against the specified country.

name: is_running_operation
desc: Checks if the current scope is running an operation against the specified country.

name: num_finished_operations
desc: Checks how many finished operations the current scope had against the specified country.

name: has_operation_token
desc: Checks if the current scope has an operation token against an another country.

name: is_active_decryption_bonuses_enabled
desc: Checks if the current scope has any decryption bonuses towards the specified country.

name: is_cryptology_department_active
desc: Checks if the current scope has a cryptology department active.

name: is_decrypting
desc: Checks if the current scope is decrypting a certain country.

name: is_fully_decrypted
desc: Checks if the current scope has fully decrypted a certain country.

name: num_fake_intel_divisions
desc: Checks the amount of fake intel divisions.

name: num_free_operative_slots
desc: Checks the amount of free operative slots.

name: num_operative_slots
desc: Checks the amount of operative slots.

name: num_of_operatives
desc: Checks the amount of operatives.

name: ai_irrationality
desc: Checks if the current scope AI has the specified irrationality.

name: ai_liberate_desire
desc: Checks if the current scope AI has the specified liberation desire towards the specified country.

name: ai_has_role_division
desc: Checks if the current scope AI has a division with the specified role.

name: ai_has_role_template
desc: Checks if the current scope AI has a division template with the specified role.

name: ai_wants_divisions
desc: Checks if the current scope AI desires the specified amount of divisions.

name: has_template_ai_majority_unit
desc: Checks if the current scope AI has a division template mostly made up of the specified unit.

name: can_be_country_leader
desc: Checks if the specified character has a country leader role, active or not, and can utilise it in this country.

name: has_character
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified character recruited. The character does NOT need to be in power.

name: has_country_leader
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified country leader.

name: has_country_leader_ideology
desc: Checks if the current scope's active country leader has the specified ideology.

name: has_country_leader_with_trait
desc: Checks if the leader of the country has a specific trait.

name: is_female
desc: Checks if the current country leader or character is female.

name: has_unit_leader
desc: Checks if the current scope has a unit leader with the specified id.

name: has_scientist_specialization
desc: Checks if the country in scope has a scientist with a skill level of at least 1 in specialization.

name: pc_is_winner
desc: Checks if the current scope is a winner within the peace conference.

name: pc_is_on_winning_side
desc: Checks if the current scope is on the winning side within the peace conference.

name: pc_is_loser
desc: Checks if the current scope is a loser within the peace conference.

name: pc_is_untouched_loser
desc: Checks if the current scope is an untouched loser within the peace conference.

name: pc_is_on_same_side_as
desc: Checks if the current scope is on the same side of the peace conference as the specified country.

name: pc_is_liberated
desc: Checks if the current scope has been liberated within the peace conference.

name: pc_is_liberated_by
desc: Checks if the current scope has been liberated within the peace conference by the specified country.

name: pc_is_puppeted
desc: Checks if the current scope has been puppeted within the peace conference.

name: pc_is_puppeted_by
desc: Checks if the current scope has been puppeted within the peace conference by the specified country.

name: pc_is_forced_government
desc: Checks if the current scope has had an enforced government change within the peace conference.

name: pc_is_forced_government_by
desc: Checks if the current scope has had an enforced government change within the peace conference demanded by the specified country.

name: pc_is_forced_government_to
desc: Checks if the current scope has had an enforced government change to the specified ideology group.

name: pc_total_score
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount in total score within the peace conference.

name: pc_current_score
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount in current score within the peace conference.

name: state
desc: Checks if the current scope is the specified state.

name: region
desc: Checks if the current scope is a state in the specified strategic region.

name: free_building_slots
desc: Checks if the current scope has available slots for the specified amount of buildings.

name: non_damaged_building_level
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of the specified buildings that are undamaged.

name: any_province_building_level
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified provincal building at the specified amount in the specified provinces.

name: has_state_flag
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified flag. Can also compare the flag's last set date, days since last set, and/or value.

name: state_population
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified state population.

name: state_population_k
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified state population in thousands.

name: is_capital
desc: Checks if the current scope is a capital.

name: is_controlled_by
desc: Checks if the current scope is controlled by the specified country.

name: is_fully_controlled_by
desc: Checks if the current scope is fully controlled by the specified country.

name: is_owned_by
desc: Checks if the current scope is owned by the specified country.

name: is_claimed_by
desc: Checks if the current scope is claimed by the specified country.

name: is_core_of
desc: Checks if the current scope is a core of the specified country.

name: is_owned_and_controlled_by
desc: Checks if the current scope is owned and controlled by the specified country.

name: is_demilitarized_zone
desc: Checks if the current scope is a demilitarized zone.

name: is_border_conflict
desc: Checks if the current scope is part of a border war.

name: is_in_home_area
desc: Checks if the current scope is connected to the capital state over land.

name: is_coastal
desc: Checks if the current scope is a coastal state.

name: is_one_state_island
desc: Checks if the current scope is a coastal state with no adjacent land states.

name: is_island_state
desc: Checks if the current scope is a state where every province has no land neighbour.

name: is_on_continent
desc: Checks if the current scope is on the specified continent.

name: impassable
desc: Checks if the current scope is impassable.

name: has_state_category
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified category.

name: state_strategic_value
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified strategic value.

name: state_and_terrain_strategic_value
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified state and terrain strategic value.

name: num_owned_neighbour_states
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of neighbor states belonging to the specified country.

name: distance_to
desc: Checks if the current scope is at the specified distance from the specified state.

name: ships_in_area
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of ships in the specified strategic region.

name: resource_count_trigger
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of the specified resource. Name is the resource, e.g. 'tungsten'.

name: has_resources_amount
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of the specified resource.

name: days_since_last_strategic_bombing
desc: Checks how many days have passed since the last strategic bombing of the state.

name: has_railway_connection
desc: Returns true if the states or provinces are connected by a railway.

name: can_build_railway
desc: Returns true if a railway can be built between states or provinces.

name: has_railway_level
desc: Checks if a state contains a railway at or above the specified level.

name: pc_does_state_stack_demilitarized
desc: Checks if the current scope was demilitarised during a current or previously-ended peace conference.

name: pc_does_state_stack_dismantled
desc: Checks if the current scope was dismantled during a current or previously-ended peace conference.

name: pc_is_state_claimed
desc: Checks if the current scope was claimed by any country during the peace conference.

name: pc_is_state_claimed_by
desc: Checks if the current scope was claimed by the specified country during the peace conference.

name: pc_is_state_claimed_and_taken_by
desc: Checks if the current scope was claimed with 'Take State' action (i.e. annexed) by the specified country during the peace conference.

name: pc_is_state_outside_influence_for_winner
desc: Checks if the current state is outside of the influence of the specified winner country.

name: pc_turn
desc: Compares the amount of turns that have passed during the peace conference with a number.

name: can_construct_building
desc: Checks if the country (as ROOT) and state in scope can build a building in the state.

name: compliance
desc: Compares the compliance value of the current scope with the given value.

name: compliance_speed
desc: Compares the compliance speed of the current scope with the given value.

name: has_active_resistance
desc: Checks if the current scope has non-zero resistance.

name: has_resistance
desc: Checks if the current scope has resistance.

name: resistance
desc: Compares the resistance value of the current scope with the given value.

name: resistance_speed
desc: Compares the resistance speed of the current scope with the given value.

name: resistance_target
desc: Compares the target resistance value of the current scope with the given value.

name: has_occupation_modifier
desc: Checks if the current scope has an occupation modifier, changing resistance/compliance.

name: occupied_country_tag
desc: Checks which country creates resistance.

name: is_character
desc: Checks if the current character's token matches up with the specified one.

name: is_country_leader
desc: Checks if the character in the current scope is the active country leader.

name: is_unit_leader
desc: Checks if the character in the current scope has an active unit leader (Army/Navy leader) role.

name: is_advisor
desc: Checks if the character in the current scope has an advisor role (includes advisors/theorists/high command).

name: is_air_chief
desc: Checks if the character in the current scope is selected as an air chief.

name: is_army_chief
desc: Checks if the character in the current scope is selected as an army chief.

name: is_army_leader
desc: Checks if the character in the current scope has an army leader (General/Field Marshal) role.

name: is_navy_chief
desc: Checks if the character in the current scope is selected as a navy chief.

name: is_navy_leader
desc: Checks if the character in the current scope has an navy leader (Admiral) role.

name: is_high_command
desc: Checks if the character in the current scope is selected as high command.

name: is_corps_commander
desc: Checks if the character in the current scope is a corps commander.

name: is_operative
desc: Checks if the character in the current scope is an operative.

name: is_political_advisor
desc: Checks if the character in the current scope is selected as a political advisor.

name: is_theorist
desc: Checks if the character in the current scope is selected as a theorist.

name: is_character_slot
desc: Checks if the character in the current scope has a role within the specified character slot.

name: has_air_ledger
desc: Checks if the character in the current scope has an air ledger.

name: has_army_ledger
desc: Checks if the character in the current scope has an army ledger.

name: has_navy_ledger
desc: Checks if the character in the current scope has an navy ledger.

name: has_character_flag
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified flag. Can also compare the flag's last set date, days since last set, and/or value.

name: has_trait
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified trait.

name: has_id
desc: Checks if the current character has the specificed ID.

name: is_hired_as_advisor
desc: Checks if the current character is activated as an advisor in any slot.

name: not_already_hired_except_as
desc: Checks if the current character is not hired, with the exception of the specified slot.

name: advisor_can_be_fired
desc: Checks if the current character's can_be_fired attribute is set or not within a certain slot.

name: has_advisor_role
desc: Checks if the character in scope has an advisor role for the given slot.

name: has_ideology
desc: Checks if the current character has the specificed sub-ideology assigned.

name: has_ideology_group
desc: Checks if the current character has the specificed ideology assigned.

name: has_unit_leader_flag
desc: Deprecated. Use has_character_flag instead. Compares the specified flag's last set date, days since last set, and/or value.

name: is_leading_army
desc: Checks if the current scope is leading a single army.

name: is_leading_army_group
desc: Checks if the current scope is leading an army group.

name: is_leading_volunteer_group
desc: Checks if the current scope is leading a volunteer army within the specified country.

name: is_leading_volunteer_group_with_original_country
desc: Checks if the current scope is leading a volunteer army within a country of the specified original tag.

name: is_field_marshal
desc: Checks if the current scope is a Field Marshal.

name: is_assigned
desc: Checks if the current scope is an assigned unit leader.

name: can_select_trait
desc: Checks if the current scope can select the specified trait.

name: has_ability
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified unit leader ability.

name: skill
desc: Checks if the current scope has a Skill above the specified amount.

name: skill_advantage
desc: Checks if the current scope has a Skill advantage above the specified amount in against an enemy unit leader whilst in combat.

name: planning_skill_level
desc: Checks if the current scope has a Planning skill above the specified amount.

name: logistics_skill_level
desc: Checks if the current scope has a Logistics skill above the specified amount.

name: defense_skill_level
desc: Checks if the current scope has a Defense skill above the specified amount.

name: attack_skill_level
desc: Checks if the current scope has a Attack skill above the specified amount.

name: average_stats
desc: Checks if the current scope has an average skill above the specified amount.

name: is_border_war
desc: Checks if the current scope is in a border war.

name: num_units
desc: Checks if the current scope is commanding the specified amount of divisions.

name: is_exiled_leader
desc: Checks if the current scope is a general from an exiled country.

name: is_exiled_leader_from
desc: Checks if the current scope is a general from the specified exiled country.

name: has_nationality
desc: Checks if the current operative has the nationality.

name: is_operative_captured
desc: Checks if the current scope is captured.

name: operative_leader_mission
desc: Checks if the current scope is on the given mission.

name: operative_leader_operation
desc: Checks if the current scope is on the given operation.

name: has_scientist_level
desc: Checks if the scientist of the character in scope matches the skill level condition for a specialization.

name: is_active_scientist
desc: Checks if the scientist of the character in scope is assigned to a project.

name: is_scientist_injured
desc: Checks if the scientist of the character in scope is injured.

name: hardness
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of hardness.

name: armor
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of armor units.

name: dig_in
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of Dig In bonus.

name: min_planning
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of planning.

name: fastest_unit
desc: Checks if the current scope has a unit with the specified speed.

name: temperature
desc: Checks if the current scope is in a province with a temperature above the specified amount.

name: reserves
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified amount of reserves waiting.

name: has_combat_modifier
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified combat modifier.

name: is_fighting_in_terrain
desc: Checks if the current scope is fighting in the specified terrain.

name: is_fighting_in_weather
desc: Checks if the current scope is fighting in the specified weather.

name: phase
desc: Checks if the current scope is in phase.

name: recon_advantage
desc: Checks if the current scope has x recon advantage.

name: night
desc: Checks if the current scope is fighting at night.

name: frontage_full
desc: Checks if the current scope has a full combat width.

name: has_flanked_opponent
desc: Checks if the current scope has flanked their opponent.

name: has_max_planning
desc: Checks if the current scope has the maximum planning bonus.

name: has_reserves
desc: Checks if the current scope has any reserves waiting.

name: is_amphibious_invasion
desc: Checks if the current scope is performing an amphibious invasion.

name: is_attacker
desc: Checks if the current scope is attacking.

name: is_defender
desc: Checks if the current scope is defending.

name: is_winning
desc: Checks if the current scope is winning their battle.

name: is_fighting_air_units
desc: Checks if the current scope is fighting air units.

name: less_combat_width_than_opponent
desc: Checks if the current scope is fighting with less combat width than their opponent.

name: has_carrier_airwings_on_mission
desc: Checks if the current scope has carrier airwings on a mission.

name: has_carrier_airwings_in_own_combat
desc: Checks if the current scope has carrier airwings in their own combat.

name: has_artillery_ratio
desc: Check that ratio of atrillery battalions in the composition of a side of combating troops are over a certain level.

name: has_unit_type
desc: Check if the combatant has at least one of the provided unit types.

name: division_has_majority_template
desc: Checks if the current scope is majority made up of the specified battalion.

name: division_has_battalion_in_template
desc: Checks if the current scope has any battalions of the type in the template.

name: unit_strength
desc: Checks the current strength of the unit on the scale from 0 to 1.

name: unit_organisation
desc: Checks the current organisation of the unit on the scale from 0 to 1.

name: is_unit_template_reserves
desc: Checks if the current division has the supply priority set to 'Reserves'.

name: is_military_industrial_organization
desc: Checks if the currently-scoped MIO matches the input token.

name: is_mio_visible
desc: Checks if the currently-scoped MIO is visible.

name: is_mio_available
desc: Checks if the currently-scoped MIO is available.

name: is_mio_assigned_to_task
desc: Checks if the currently-scoped MIO is assigned to a task.

name: has_mio_size
desc: Checks the size of the MIO.

name: has_mio_trait
desc: Checks whether the MIO has the target trait in its list.

name: is_mio_trait_available
desc: Checks whether the MIO has the target trait in its list and whether it's available.

name: is_mio_trait_completed
desc: Checks whether the MIO has the target trait in its list and whether it's completed.

name: has_mio_number_of_completed_traits
desc: Checks the amount of unlocked MIO traits.

name: has_mio_flag
desc: Checks if the current scope has the specified flag. Can also compare the flag's last set date, days since last set, and/or value.

name: has_mio_policy
desc: Checks if the currently-scoped MIO has the target policy allowed.

name: has_mio_policy_active
desc: Checks if the currently-scoped MIO has the target policy active.

name: has_mio_research_category
desc: Checks if the currently-scoped MIO has the target research category.

name: has_mio_equipment_type
desc: Checks if the currently-scoped MIO has the target equipment types.

name: contract_contains_equipment
desc: Checks if the currently-scoped purchase contract contains an equipment type.

name: deal_completion
desc: Checks the deal completion with the target value.

name: seller
desc: Checks the seller in the current purchase contract.

name: buyer
desc: Checks the buyer in the current purchase contract.

name: has_project_flag
desc: Check if flag has been set within the special project in scope. May checks on the value or date/days since last modified date.
